## hpr0696 :: MrGadgets Path toward Linux

 MrGadgets' final episode on his Path toward Linux
Other shows in this group are:

2011-04-04, MrGadgets Path toward Linux
2011-05-15, Journey to Linux
2011-06-20, My Path to Linux: Knoppix
2011-07-10, MrGadgets finds Linux
